00436        /*
00437         *  Finds out if a given segment (the whole or a part of) is inside 
00438         *  a given bounding box. The boundary is not included in the "inside"
00439         *  so a part of the segment must be in the interor of the bounding
00440         *  box in order to be counted as inside. 
00441         *
00442         *  @param  bbox     Bounding box used. 
00443         *
00444         *  @param  (y1,x1)  One endpoint of the segment
00445         *
00446         *  @param  (y2,x2)  Other endpoint of the segment
00447         *
00448         *  @return          True if some part of the segment is inside
00449         *                   the bounding box, false otherwise.
00450         */
00451        static bool isSegmentInMC2BoundingBox(const MC2BoundingBox* bbox,
00452                                              int32 y1, int32 x1, int32 y2,
00453                                              int32 x2);

00930 //======================================================================

00932 
00933 
00934 inline bool
00935 GfxUtility::pointInsideRect( int32 x, int32 y, int32 minX, int32 maxX,
00936                              int32 minY, int32 maxY )
00937 {
00938    if (((minX <= x) && (x <= maxX)) && ((minY <= y) && (y <= maxY)))
00939       return true;
00940    else
00941       return false;
00942 }
